import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'../assets/css/ProductList.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ProductList(){const[products,setProducts]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{axios.get('/api/products').then(response=>setProducts(response.data)).catch(error=>console.error('Error fetching products:',error));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Our Products"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-grid",children:products.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:product.productName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:product.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Price: $",product.productPrice.toFixed(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Category: ",product.category]})]},product.productId))})]});}export default ProductList;
